alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Cheyenne; Morrill; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued May 20 at 3:32AM CDT until May 21 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Box Butte County, Scotts Bluff County, Morrill County and Cheyenne County. This includes Scottsbluff, Alliance, and Sidney. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Cheyenne; Morrill; Scotts Bluff
